ValidationRule.description: checks if there's data missing in aXcessa Opportunity contact roles in the data pipeline validation rule.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Contract_Date_Sent__c )), RecordType.DeveloperName = "axcessa", OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Contract Sent"), ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Contract Received") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Data missing in Contact Roles. Check again.
